abstract: Meryl Streep, Kevin Kline and more reminisce about Joseph Papp, the brilliant, domineering and fiercely loyal founder of the Public Theater.
snippet: Meryl Streep, Kevin Kline and more reminisce about Joseph Papp, the brilliant, domineering and fiercely loyal founder of the Public Theater.

headline.main: Memories of Joseph Papp Abound at Public Theater Celebration
